channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping on pavement, 23rd August
item.description:

item.title: On public road back of gardens, 23rd August
item.description:
This vechicle has been dumped outside our back gate, for a month The Vechicle is not taxed and MOT has expired since May , the doors are open , this keeps happening in our area and would like this dealt with. Itâ€™s a hazard, asking for people to vandalise This has to be dealt with

item.title: The tree blocking the footpath, 23rd August
item.description:

item.title: Tree support and cage smashed, 23rd August
item.description:

item.title: Pothole/Depression of highway surface, 23rd August
item.description:
Huge depression forming by the round about following some excavation works. The reinstatement works did not compact the ground properly. It been like this for + 6 months and getting worse. Feels terrible as bus goes over it
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Asylum Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins, 23rd August
item.description:
Bins on the pavement for 7 months now. They have front gardens if they can't put them at the back, they bought the houses. The bins were always in the back, perhaps they have a deal with the council, I will be talking to the local counsellor soon.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bexley Lane, Crayford, London

item.title: Dangerous sharp metal sticking out of swing - my child cut his arm, 23rd August
item.description:
Circular swings, one is missing all of its black rubber cover over the part of the swing that children rest their arms on which keeps them secure. Bits of sharp metal poking out and my child (2 years) cut his arm today.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Springfield, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
